welcomeChannel: <Set channel for welcome message on setup>
modRole: <Set the role which has full access over the bot on setup>
voiceRole: <Set the role which get on joining voice on setup>
logChannel: <Set channel for log messages on setup>

rules.channel: <Set channel where baseRole is given on acceptMessage on setup>
rules.acceptMessage: <Message in channel to gain base role>
rules.baseRole: <Set the role which has ful access over the bot on setup>
